description:
Kondo`s time to shine finally arrives, while Handa gets caught in a conversation with a bishoujo figure.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Handa et le garçon ordinaire / Handa et le club bishôjo
Handa-kun and the Average Guy / Handa-kun and the Bishoujo
Handa-kun to Heibon / Handa-kun to Bishoujo
半田くんと平凡 / 半田くんと美少女
